name: Petrified
description: A petrified creature is transformed to stone, incapacitated, and has resistance to all damage but immunity to poison.

effects.description: While you have the Petrified condition, you experience the following effects.
mechanicalEffects: You are transformed, along with any nonmagical objects you are wearing and carrying, into a solid inanimate substance (usually stone). Your weight increases by a factor of ten, and you cease aging
Your Speed is 0 and can't increase
Attack rolls against you have Advantage
You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity saving throws
You have Resistance to all damage
You have Immunity to the Poisoned condition
